body:
YES! Finally we get a collection of this stuff, and man was it worth the wait! Pages 126 to 134 are gorgeous, though it's worth reading the other stories for comparison. 

To whoever keeps uploading these Yuma x Astral doujinshi, you have my eternal gratitude.
I mean, Astral doesn't have a dick, so...
Yaoi tag plz, I have this blacklisted 4 a reason!
